page.title: 11Nestles today, in Dalston.
page.content: Nestles is a milk factory which is on the East side of Dalston Village on Carlisle Road.The managers name is Mr Dean and the personal managers name is Mr Martlew.The main office is in Switzerland,there are many Nestles factories all over the world.It costs 14.4 million to run the factory. Nestles today covers 850,000 square feet of ground.There are about 200 people employed at Nestles product's made are tinned cream, Condensed milk,and Nido,All the product's have a milk base.Raw milk is delivered to the Factory in tankers from local farms it is then processed into milk powder,Condensed milk, and tinned milk.First of all the products go to Silloth where they are stored on a ship and taken abroad.Nestles produce (see page 19)
